sentences.english: In addition, the inscription on precipices in Ming dynasty also add somewhat majesty to the ancient shut fortress.
sentences.chinese: 明代摩崖石刻也給古關要塞增添了幾分威嚴。

sentences.english: The lion is called the king of animals primarily because of its regal appearance.
sentences.chinese: 獅子被稱爲萬獸之王，主要是因爲它威嚴的長相。

sentences.english: It was raining heavily, whether or not we should choose to hide in the refuge.
sentences.chinese: 雨上的很小，人們能否當要挑選藏正在躲威嚴港外。

sentences.english: Dominion and fear are with him, he maketh peace in his high places.
sentences.chinese: 神有治理之權，威嚴可畏，他在高天之處施行和平。

sentences.english: Lions, the symbol of the southwest of France which represents power and stateliness .
sentences.chinese: 而雄獅是法國西南部的象徵，代表着力量和威嚴。

sentences.english: You can see that the "Emperor" of the authority and court ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 在這裏可以看到“清朝皇帝”的威嚴和朝廷儀式。

sentences.english: It was a lazy, breezy autumn afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個懶惰的，起威嚴的春夜下晝。

sentences.english: It was amusing to notice how the consequential Jones was already beginning to give himself airs on the strength of the capture.
sentences.chinese: 這時傲慢的瓊斯已逐漸露出他對囚犯大擺威嚴的神氣。

sentences.english: Is dignity nobility, resolute and courageous pursue dream.
Deck thyself now with majesty and excellency; and array thyself with glory and beauty.
sentences.chinese: 你要以榮耀莊嚴爲妝飾，以尊榮威嚴爲衣服。

sentences.english: We expect courts to have an aloof and slightly intimidating atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 我們希望法庭的氣氛是冷淡和稍顯威嚴的。

sentences.english: With muted footfalls, an elephant treads majestically across a clearing.
sentences.chinese: 一隻大象帶着無聲的腳步，充滿威嚴地走過一片空地。

sentences.english: The uniform imparts a dignified appearance to him.
sentences.chinese: 這身制服使他顯得威嚴。

sentences.english: The night wind whirls in the sky and sings.
sentences.chinese: 夜間的威嚴在地面迴旋，歌頌。

sentences.english: The majestic stone lions symbolizing the courthouse lords are sacred and inviolable.
sentences.chinese: 威嚴的石獅子彰顯着法院老爺的神聖不可侵犯。

sentences.english: And suddenly everyone will discover that thevenerable emperor has no clothes.
sentences.chinese: 每個人都將忽然間發現，威嚴的皇帝沒穿衣裳。

definition: cultured and refined (idiom); gentle and cultivated
living spirit, living image (idiom); true to life/vivid and realistic
